content:
Apologies if this is the wrong stream to be asking in! :sweat: zulip's UI is.. a lil strange.

I was having a look at Iterator's intersperse and intersperse_with methods and it seems like they're in a pretty decent place. I asked about what stabilization would entail on the Discord server and got pointed here - is there any chance I might've missed any bikeshedding or anything otherwise blocking the stabilization of these features? I was considering potentially opening a stabilization PR but I want to make sure I haven't missed anything important.

Thanks for any help!
